title: Provide Programmatic Access to CheckIndex: checkFields()
description: Would like to have programmatic access to CheckIndex.checkFields() field-by-field.  This allows the developer to check different fields in different threads concurrently.

comments.author: Todd Flanders
comments.content: I did this in local project code for multiple releases of Lucene.  Perhaps I should contribute to Lucene Core?

comments.author: Adrien Grand
comments.content: It is already possible to do so by running CheckIndex on a CodecReader that only exposes a subset of the fields of the original reader.
